snippet.title: Two Falls (Nishu Takuathsina) - Gameplay Short Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore 17th century Canadian wilderness through the eyes of Jeanne, a French woman who crossed the Atlantic to start anew and Maikan, an Innu hunter trying to discover what’s disturbing the forest. Your choices will shape the traits of the protagonists in this narrative single-player experience.

If you liked our trailer, wishlist us on Steam! It's the best way to support the project and let us know you like the game! 

👾 Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671740/Two_Falls_Nishu_Takuatshina/?utm_source=youtube

You can also follow us on our social media!
🐦Twitter : https://twitter.com/TwoFalls
🍂Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/unreliablenarratorsgames
🌲Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/two.falls/
📱Tiktok : https://www.tiktok.com/@two.falls

For even more information, visit our website!
🌿Website : https://two-falls.com/

Coming out in Fall 2023 on Steam
TBD on Xbox and Playstation
